sections.heading: Core Function
sections.content: くらい/ぐらい expresses approximation or extent - "about" or "approximately".

children.heading: 1. Approximate Quantity
children.content: 10個くらい - "about 10" 1時間くらい - "about 1 hour" 100円くらい - "about 100 yen" 三日くらい - "about 3 days"

children.heading: 2. Extent/Degree
children.content: 死ぬくらい疲れた "tired to death" (exaggeration) 泣きたいくらい嬉しい "so happy I could cry"

children.heading: 3. Minimum Expectation "At Least"
children.content: これくらいできる "can at least do this much" 挨拶くらいしなさい "at least say hello"

sections.heading: くらい vs ぐらい
sections.content:
Same meaning, ぐらい slightly more casual:

10個くらい ✓ 10個ぐらい ✓ Both mean "about 10"

Use either - personal preference.

sections.heading: Common Patterns
sections.content: [Number]くらい 10個くらい - "about 10" [Extent]くらい これくらい - "this much" [Verb potential]くらい できるくらい - "to the extent can do"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Approximation "about" ✓ Extent/degree ✓ Minimum expectation ✓ くらい = ぐらい (same meaning)

Related:

ほど (hodo) だけ (dake)
